data.title: Trump warns China could face consequences for virus outbreak
data.text: White House on Saturday speaking partially of the virus itself, partly hammering away at 'fake news' and one New York Times reporter, and a good chunk of time criticizing China and how it handled the outbreak of COVID-19.Asked whether there should be consequences to China if it was responsible for all of the virus spread, Trump said sure, unless it was a 'mistake.'
